scripts.quickstart:barge: export ADDRESS_FILE="${HOME}/.ocean/ocean-contracts/artifacts/address.json" && npm run codegen && npm run bargesetup && npm run create:local-barge && npm run deploy:local-barge
scripts.deploy:local: graph deploy oceanprotocol/ocean-subgraph subgraph.yaml --debug --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy:local-barge: graph deploy oceanprotocol/ocean-subgraph subgraph.barge.yaml --debug --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:9020
scripts.deploy:local-rinkeby: graph deploy oceanprotocol/ocean-subgraph subgraph.rinkeby.yaml --debug --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy:local-ropsten: graph deploy oceanprotocol/ocean-subgraph subgraph.ropsten.yaml --debug --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy:local-polygon: graph deploy oceanprotocol/ocean-subgraph subgraph.polygon.yaml --debug --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy:local-moonbeamalpha: graph deploy oceanprotocol/ocean-subgraph subgraph.moonbeamalpha.yaml --debug --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy:local-gaiaxtestnet: graph deploy oceanprotocol/ocean-subgraph subgraph.gaiaxtestnet.yaml --debug --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy:local-mumbai: graph deploy oceanprotocol/ocean-subgraph subgraph.mumbai.yaml --debug --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy:local-bsc: graph deploy oceanprotocol/ocean-subgraph subgraph.bsc.yaml --debug --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.test: npm run codegen && npm run lint && npm run type-check
